help.description: To get help on all supported commands, or a specified command

price.description: Fetches price in $ of the specified coin

volume.description: Fetches 24h volume of the specified coin

gains.description: Fetches percentage price changes of the specified coin

top.description: Displays list of top 10 coins by market cap

gainers.description: Displays list of top 10 coins by price percentage increase (24h)

losers.description: Displays list of top 10 coins by price percentage loss (24h)
